description.displayText: Natalia is smart, thoughtful, professional and wonderful with children. She relates to both younger and older children and is able to handle all sorts of tasks. As Natalia is a professional person, her ability to interact with the family she is working for and to execute on their needs is excellent. She is totally reliable, relatable, has a very positive outlook on life and is a delightful person.
description.originalText: Natalia is smart, thoughtful, professional and wonderful with children. She relates to both younger and older children and is able to handle all sorts of tasks. As Natalia is a professional person, her ability to interact with the family she is working for and to execute on their needs is excellent. She is totally reliable, relatable, has a very positive outlook on life and is a delightful person.

description.displayText: Natalia was an amazing Nanny! She was incredibly diligent with my 3 kids. She was responsible for driving them to school, planning play dates, feeding them and ensuring that they do things other than watch TV! Natalia is incredibly energetic and genuinely enjoys children. She was a terrific nanny and we would hire her again in a second! You cannot go wrong with Natalia as a nanny or babysitter!
